cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-0027

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-0034

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-0059
